entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
